lines.speaker: Maren
lines.text: Welcome, welcome! You must be the one Callum's been talking about — the new Architect!

lines.speaker: Maren
lines.text: Take a look! Potions, antidotes, and the odd curiosity.

lines.speaker: Maren
lines.text: Excellent choice! That'll serve you well out there.

lines.speaker: Maren
lines.text: I can take that off your hands. Fair price, always.

lines.speaker: Maren
lines.text: Not quite enough gold for that one.

lines.speaker: Torvan
lines.text: Mm. New Architect? Callum told me. I make weapons and armor — nothing fancy, but solid.

lines.speaker: Torvan
lines.text: Steel, leather, and honest craft. No enchantments.

lines.speaker: Torvan
lines.text: Good blade, that. Treat it right and it'll return the favor.

lines.speaker: Torvan
lines.text: I'll melt it down and make something better.

lines.speaker: Torvan
lines.text: Can't give it away, friend. Gold talks.

lines.speaker: Ren
lines.text: The Bright Hearth — best inn in the village! Well, only inn. Rest your feet, rest your mind.

lines.speaker: Ren
lines.text: Sweet dreams. The beds are soft and the walls keep out the worry.

lines.speaker: Ren
lines.text: Rest well. You've earned it more than most.
